Hti, the Burmese name of the umbrellas placed on pagodas and temples in Myanmar - Hti is the name of the umbrella or top ornament found on almost all pagodas in Myanmar—Burma.

wiki.text:
'Hti' (, ; ; Shan: ) is the name of the umbrella or top ornament found on almost
all pagodas in Myanmar—Burma.

The Hti can be said as the main distinctive feature of pagodas in Myanmar, as
they are more prominent than their Sri Lankan counterparts, while the Laotian
and Thai pagodas do not have any.
wiki.title: hti
